entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
